abstract: Michiel Prins, Jobert Abma, Merijn Terheggen and Alex Rice are co-founders of HackerOne, which hopes to become middleman between companies and hackers who find cybersecurity flaws in companies' websites and products; company seeks to upend current system of discovering companies' cybersecurity flaws, which essentially incentivizes criminality instead of coming up with solutions to those flaws.
lead_paragraph: HackerOne’s co-founders are betting they can persuade the world’s hackers to spend their free time solving security’s problems, not causing them, and that businesses will pay them a bounty for their service.

headline.main: HackerOne Connects Hackers With Companies, and Hopes for a Win-Win
